verses.verse: Let us<WG5399> fear<WG5399> therefore<WG3767>, lest<WG3379> haply<WG1860>, a promise being left<WG2641> of entering<WG1525> into<WG1519> his<WG846> rest<WG2663>, any<WG5100> one of<WG1537> you<WG5216> should seem<WG1380> to have come short of it<WG5302>.

For <WG1063> indeed<WG2532> we have had<WG2070> good tidings preached<WG2097> unto us<WG2509>, even as also they<WG2548>: but<WG235> the word<WG3056> of hearing<WG189> did<WG5623> not<WG3756> profit<WG5623> them<WG1565>, because it was not<WG3361> united<WG4786> by faith<WG4102> with them that heard<WG191>.

For <WG1063> we<WG1525> who have believed<WG4100> do enter<WG1525> into<WG1519> that rest<WG2663>; even as<WG2531> he hath said<WG2046>, As<WG5613> I sware<WG3660> in<WG1722> my<WG3450> wrath<WG3709>, <WG1487> They shall not enter<WG1525> into<WG1519> my<WG3450> rest<WG2663>: although<WG2543> the works<WG2041> were finished<WG1096> from<WG575> the foundation<WG2602> of the world<WG2889>.

For <WG1063> he hath said<WG2046> somewhere<WG4225> of<WG4012> the seventh<WG1442> day on this wise<WG3779>, And<WG2532> God<WG2316> rested<WG2664> on<WG1722> the<WG2250> seventh<WG1442> day<WG2250> from<WG575> all<WG3956> his<WG846> works<WG2041>;
and <WG2532> in<WG1722> this<WG5129> place again<WG3825>, <WG1487> They shall not enter<WG1525> into<WG1519> my<WG3450> rest<WG2663>.

Seeing <WG1893> therefore<WG3767> it remaineth<WG620> that some<WG5100> should enter<WG1525> thereinto<WG846>, <WG1519> and<WG2532> they to whom the good tidings were<WG2097> before<WG4386> preached<WG2097> failed<WG3756> to enter<WG1525> in<WG1525> because of<WG1223> disobedience<WG543>,

he again<WG3825> defineth<WG3724> a certain<WG5100> day<WG2250>, To-day<WG4594>, saying<WG3004> in<WG1722> David<WG1138> so long<WG5118> a time<WG5550> afterward<WG3326> (even as<WG2531> hath been said<WG2046> before<WG4594>), To-day if<WG1437> ye shall hear<WG191> his<WG846> voice<WG5456>, Harden<WG4645> not<WG3361> your<WG5216> hearts<WG2588>.

For <WG1063> if<WG1487> Joshua<WG2424> had given<WG2664> them<WG846> rest<WG2664>, <WG302> he<WG2980> would not<WG3756> have spoken2980, Deuteronomy23 afterward<WG3326> of<WG4012> another<WG243> day<WG2250>.
There remaineth<WG620> therefore<WG686> a sabbath rest<WG4520> for the people<WG2992> of God<WG2316>.

For <WG1063> he<WG846> that is entered<WG1525> into<WG1519> his<WG846> rest<WG2663> hath himself<WG846> also<WG2532> rested<WG2664> from<WG575> his works<WG2041>, as<WG5618> God<WG2316> did from<WG575> his<WG846>.

Let us therefore<WG3767> give diligence<WG4704> to enter<WG1525> into<WG1519> that<WG1565> rest<WG2443>, that<WG3361> no man<WG5100> fall<WG4098> after<WG1722> the same<WG846> example<WG5262> of disobedience<WG543>.

For <WG1063> the word<WG3056> of God<WG2316> is living<WG2198>, and<WG2532> active<WG1756>, and<WG2532> sharper<WG5114> than<WG5228> any<WG3956> two-edged<WG1366> sword<WG3162>, and piercing<WG1338> even<WG2532> to<WG891> the dividing<WG3311> of<WG5037> soul<WG5590> and<WG2532> spirit<WG4151>, of both<WG5037> joints<WG719> and<WG5037> marrow<WG3452>, and<WG2532> quick to discern<WG2924> the thoughts<WG1761> and<WG2532> intents<WG1771> of the heart<WG2588>.

And there<WG2076> is no<WG3756> creature<WG2937> that is not manifest<WG852> in<WG1799> his<WG846> sight<WG1799>: but<WG1161> all things<WG3956> are naked<WG1131> and<WG2532> laid open<WG5136> before the eyes<WG3788> of him<WG846> with<WG4314> whom<WG3739> we have<WG2254> to do<WG3056>.

Having <WG2192> then<WG3767> a great<WG3173> high priest<WG749>, who hath passed through<WG1330> the heavens<WG3772>, Jesus<WG2424> the Son<WG5207> of God<WG2316>, let us hold fast<WG2902> our confession<WG3671>.

For <WG1063> we have<WG2192> not<WG3756> a high priest<WG749> that<WG1410> cannot<WG3361> be touched with the feeling<WG4834> of our<WG2257> infirmities<WG769>; but<WG1161> one that hath been<WG3985> in<WG2596> all points<WG3956> tempted3985, 3987 like<WG2596> as<WG3665> we are<WG5565>, yet without sin<WG266>.

Let us<WG4334> therefore<WG3767> draw<WG4334> near<WG3326> with boldness<WG3954> unto the throne<WG2362> of grace<WG5485>, that<WG2443> we may receive<WG2983> mercy<WG1656>, and<WG2532> may find<WG2147> grace<WG5485> to help<WG996> us in time of<WG1519> need<WG2121>.
